setting.location: Interior of elegant haberdashery shop on prestigious Warsaw commercial street, Polish textile merchant establishment
setting.weather: Bright daylight filtering through large windows

characters.appearance: Distinguished man in his early 40s, dark hair with grey at temples, intelligent eyes, strong jawline, commanding presence
characters.clothing: Impeccable black business suit with silk vest, white shirt with standing collar, simple gold cufflinks
characters.action: Examining fine fabric samples with a jeweler's loupe, making notes in a ledger

characters.appearance: Elderly man in his 60s, thin build, kind face with deep wrinkles, grey hair and mustache
characters.clothing: Modest brown wool suit, slightly worn at elbows, simple white shirt, black bow tie
characters.position: Arranging mechanical toys in the shop window display
characters.action: Carefully winding up clockwork mechanisms, watching toys perform their movements with childlike fascination

scene.mainElements: Luxurious shop interior with floor-to-ceiling shelves of fine fabrics, glass display cases showing gloves and accessories, the merchant examining goods while elderly clerk tends to window display of mechanical toys
scene.details: Rich mahogany fixtures with brass fittings, rolls of silk and velvet in jewel tones, crystal chandeliers casting rainbow light, mechanical dancing figures and miniature carousels in window, accounting books open on counter, brass cash register, Persian rug on polished wood floor, no text or letters visible
scene.background: Deep shelving system extending into shop depths, ornate ceiling moldings, glimpses of storage rooms through doorways
scene.atmosphere: Refined commercial prosperity mixed with old-world craftsmanship, the mechanical toys adding whimsical contrast to serious business

composition.cameraAngle: Interior wide shot encompassing both the merchant at counter and clerk at window
composition.focus: The contrast between the powerful merchant and humble clerk with his toys
composition.depth: Window display in foreground, main shop floor in middle, storage areas visible in background

lineArt.weight: very fine, built up in layers
